text: Fadhel Abbas (born 3 June 1951) is a former Iraqi football goalkeeper who played for Iraq in the 1974 Asian Games. He played for Iraq in 1975.http://www.rsssf.com/miscellaneous/iraq-recintlp.html ==References== Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Footballers at the 1974 Asian Games Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Fadhel Abbas
